Title: Former 49ers All-Pro Iupati retires after 11-year NFL career
Description: Mike Iupati is hanging up his cleats. Iupati, 33, is retiring after 11 seasons in the NFL. A four-time Pro Bowl player, Mike Iupati spent his first five NFL seasons with the #49ers The 49ers selected Iupati with the No.
Author: NBC Sports
